de.linearbits.subframe.render
Class GnuPlot<T extends Plot<?>>

java.lang.Object
  de.linearbits.subframe.render.GnuPlot<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
GnuPlot3D, GnuPlotHistogram, GnuPlotHistogramClustered, GnuPlotHistogramStacked, GnuPlotLines, GnuPlotLinesClustered
public abstract class GnuPlot<T extends Plot<?>>
extends java.lang.Object

Static class for rendering plots with GnuPlot

Author:
Prasser, Kohlmayer
